parameter_list.helptext: X dropoff value for gapped alignment (in bits) (zero invokes default behaviour) blastn 30, megablast 20, tblastx 0, all others 15.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Show GI's in deflines.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Penalty for a nucleotide mismatch (blastn only). Default = -3.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Reward for a nucleotide match (blastn only). Default 1.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Number of database sequences to show one-line descriptions for (V). Default 500.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Number of database sequence to show alignments for (B). Default 250.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Threshold for extending hits, default if zero, blastp 11, blastn 0, blastx 12, tblastn 13, tblastx 13, megablast 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: DB Genetic code (for tblast[nx] only). Default 1.

parameter_list.helptext: Believe the query defline.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Word size, default if zero (blastn 11, megablast 28, all others 3). Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Effective length of the database (use zero for the real size). Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Number of best hits from a region to keep. Off by default. If used a value of 100 is recommended.  Very high values of -v or -b is also suggested. Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: 0 for multiple hit, 1 for single hit (does not apply to blastn).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Effective length of the search space (use zero for the real size). Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Query strands to search against database (for blast[nx], and tblastx). 3 is both, 1 is top, 2 is bottom. Default 3.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Produce HTML output.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Restrict search of database to list of GI's.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Use lower case filtering of FASTA sequence.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: X dropoff value for ungapped extensions in bits (0.0 invokes default behavior). blastn 20, megablast 10, all others 7. Default 0.0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: X dropoff value for final gapped alignment in bits (0.0 invokes default behavior). blastn/megablast 100, tblastx 0, all others 25. Default 0.0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: PSI-TBLASTN checkpoint file.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: MegaBlast search.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Location on query sequence.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Multiple Hits window size, default if zero (blastn/megablast 0, all others 40. Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Frame shift penalty (OOF algorithm for blastx). Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Length of the largest intron allowed in a translated nucleotide sequence when linking multiple distinct alignments. (0 invokes default behavior; a negative value disables linking.) Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Number of concatenated queries, for blastn and tblastn. Default 0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Force use of the legacy BLAST engine. Default No.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext:
Use composition-based score adjustments for blastp or tblastn:
As first character:
D or d: default (equivalent to T)
0 or F or f: no composition-based statistics
2 or T or t: Composition-based score adjustments as in Bioinformatics 21:902-911,
1: Composition-based statistics as in NAR 29:2994-3005, 2001, 2005, conditioned on sequence properties
3: Composition-based score adjustment as in Bioinformatics 21:902-911,2005, unconditionally

For programs other than tblastn, must either be absent or be D, F or 0.
As second character, if first character is equivalent to 1, 2, or 3:
U or u: unified p-value combining alignment p-value and compositional p-value in round 1 only
Default D.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Compute locally optimal Smith-Waterman alignments (This option is only available for gapped tblastn).

tool.description: BLAST the input files based on the options selected.
